TopicTitle: Requesting help for future part manager

Articles.Content:
Posting this request because in the little spare time I have, I play KSP, and I have little time between RL, programming, and Avalon...

What I need is screenshots of parts lists from the VAB of the pages of parts. I just need the thumbnails on the parts list so a fullscreen shot is fine, and I can edit/crop them all myself manually.

Here's parts of the mods I DON'T need because I already have them:

-Stock

-Spaceplane plus

-Kethane

-Karbonite

-Quantum struts

-B9

-KW Rocketry

-Novapunch

-Lackluster Labs

-Procedural Fairings

-Mechjeb

Anything else would be great. Just post a pic here with the ability to view the high res version of it (On imgur, it's usually accomplished by using the "Linked BBcode" line.).

This is for something I've been working on to make things easier to sort/add/remove parts and the downloading/installing/screenshotting is time consuming. I also don't want to miss out on parts that I personally wouldn't use, but might be popular out in the KSP community.

This is something that I started working on for myself but I think would benefit many people.

As people add screenshots, I will add to the list above so there are no repeats, and I don't want anyone to waste time looking through pages of images to see if it was already done.

Please add some wording in there to let me know what MOD's parts you're showing off because I don't know all of them.

Thanks in advance!

XT

Edited November 1, 2014 by xtoro

Moved to Add-on Development.

Here this will get the kind of attention it requires

Just to mention that by the title it sounded a bit lazy kind of thing, I only realized the actual reason after reading it.

Maybe you should consider rephrasing the title so people won't think you are simply asking them for something that you could just do yourself? (because that is not the case)

Changed the title... Yeah it sounded kinda lazy But I have been doing lots on my own, and cropping each part and organizing them takes lots of time...

I actually did this a while ago. I went through a huge number of mods and took screenshots and cropped the parts list thumbnails. They're kind of low-res though... also not completely comprehensive within mods (missing lots of adapters, tanks, similar-looking parts, etc.)

Meh. Each thumbnail is about 80x80, so judge for yourself.
